alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 3:01AM CDT until May 09 at 10:41AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. For the Gasconade River Basin...including Jerome...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.5 feet, flood waters begin to impact the steel residential fence line at the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 AM CDT Friday was 15.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.1 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.1 feet on 07/02/1951. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. late tonight at 315 AM CDT.
